channel.title: Help to get the music and sound effects on MoparScape 3.4 .zip version
channel.description:
Hi! :) I was playing Moparscape recently, and noticed the harp in the down right corner. I clicked it and saw that I needed to use the high-detail version of the game in order to hear the songs and the sound effects. At that time i thought that the developer ment that I had to change from "low memorie" to "high memorie" in the batch file. I tested it, but no. It didn't work.
So now I wonder, can I only hear the sounds and music on the web version? Or is there a version that isn't released yet, or simply just a file I can't find? It would be great to be able to hear the sound effects and the music in-game! I know about the sound and music files that lies in the folder ".mpr_file_store_32", so maybe they can be of use?
Thanks for answers! :D

item.title: Help to get the music and sound effects on MoparScape 3.4 .zip version
item.dc:creator: @Ebbe Ebbe
item.description:
@Ebbe wrote:

Hi!
I was playing Moparscape recently, and noticed the harp in the down right corner. I clicked it and saw that I needed to use the high-detail version of the game in order to hear the songs and the sound effects. At that time i thought that the developer ment that I had to change from “low memorie” to “high memorie” in the batch file. I tested it, but no. It didn’t work.

So now I wonder, can I only hear the sounds and music on the web version? Or is there a version that isn’t released yet, or simply just a file I can’t find? It would be great to be able to hear the sound effects and the music in-game! I know about the sound and music files that lies in the folder “.mpr_file_store_32”, so maybe they can be of use?

Thanks for answers!
